Query.Sentence: select CIF, LICENSE, TARGETDATE FROM ( SELECT CIF, 'LIC_OPENTACH' as LICENSE, LIC_OPENTACH_DEMO_TO as TARGETDATE FROM DFEMP WHERE LIC_OPENTACH_DEMO='S' and LIC_OPENTACH_DEMO_TO < sysdate UNION ALL SELECT CIF, 'LIC_TACHOLAB' as LICENSE, LIC_TACHOLAB_DEMO_TO as TARGETDATE FROM DFEMP WHERE LIC_TACHOLAB_DEMO='S' and LIC_TACHOLAB_DEMO_TO < sysdate UNION ALL SELECT CIF, 'LIC_TACHOLABPLUS' as LICENSE, LIC_TACHOLABPLUS_DEMO_TO as TARGETDATE FROM DFEMP WHERE LIC_TACHOLABPLUS_DEMO='S' and LIC_TACHOLABPLUS_DEMO_TO < sysdate ) #WHERE# #ORDER#

select CIF, LICENSE, TARGETDATE FROM ( SELECT CIF, 'LIC_OPENTACH' as LICENSE, LIC_OPENTACH_TO as TARGETDATE FROM DFEMP WHERE LIC_OPENTACH='S' and LIC_OPENTACH_TO < sysdate UNION ALL SELECT CIF, 'LIC_TACHOLAB' as LICENSE, LIC_TACHOLAB_TO as TARGETDATE FROM DFEMP WHERE LIC_TACHOLAB='S' and LIC_TACHOLAB_TO < sysdate UNION ALL SELECT CIF, 'LIC_TACHOLABPLUS' as LICENSE, LIC_TACHOLABPLUS_TO as TARGETDATE FROM DFEMP WHERE LIC_TACHOLABPLUS='S' and LIC_TACHOLABPLUS_TO < sysdate ) #WHERE# #ORDER#
SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM CDVEMPRE_REQ_REALES cont WHERE (F_BAJA is null or F_BAJA > sysdate) AND (F_ANULACION is null or F_ANULACION > sysdate) #WHERE_CONCAT# #ORDER#
